author: Pon Vasanth Arunachalam
text:
Man arrested for

chain snatchings

A 24-year-old man was arrested by Madurai City police

on Tuesday for alleged involvement in four

chain snatching cases. Police recovered 21 sovereigns of gold jewellery from him.

According to the city police, a special team formed by Commissioner of Police Shailesh Kumar Yadav arrested N. Saivam, a resident of Corporation Colony on Aruppukottai Main Road. Further investigation by the police allegedly revealed that Saivam was involved in at least four chain snatching cases reported in South Gate, Avaniapuram and Subramaniapuram

police limits.

Police said that they

were on the lookout for two more persons who were also involved in these cases.

The men had also snatched chains in Aruppukottai and Pandalkudi in Virudhunagar district,

the police said.
title: Man arrested for chain snatching
